name: EQuateJS
tagline: A web API framework using (E)vents and (Q)ueries to manage application state
body:
### Welcome to EQuateJS

EQuateJS is a web API framework using (E)vents and (Q)ueries to manage application state.

Please look forward to more updates as the core API will be released soon.

***

For now, check out these related pages:
- [CQRS Journey](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj554200.aspx)
- [Flux Application Architecture](https://facebook.github.io/flux/docs/overview.html)
- [Event Sourcing](http://martinfowler.com/eaaDev/EventSourcing.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
